Text: RE Sales to Midland Cogenpst Chris Pat is on vacation and I was out sick yesterday I will have someone in my group look at this today Greg Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Monday May PM To Couch Greg Ryder Patrick Cc Polsky Phil Dhont Margaret Hamic Priscilla Doner Max Subject Sales to Midland Cogen We stopped serving Midland Cogen on Sitara deals and effective There are trigger prices on both of these deals which automatically generates an invoice whether we physically serve the deal or not see invoice number SA for April production For April these deals are generating a credit invoice in the amount of I would like to take the trigger volumes to effective for the term of the deal to see if this reverses out the credit created in April and keeps us from sending out a credit invoice in the future Let me know if this is an issue Thanks

Resend of excel spreadsheetis the spreadsheet we discussed in todays meeting It should be pretty straightforward If you have any questions please ask Ill be happy to help you out I will look at a way to tiein Winzip with this spreadsheet I dont know if it is possible but if I can accomplish it Ill let you know Greg Forwarded by Greg CouchHOUECT on AM Greg Couch PM To Steve CT William CT Jeffrey C CT Kam CT Dutch CT cc Subject Excel file to help you out Here is a spreadsheet I worked up to help you determine what files need to be cleaned up It is pretty simple and straightforward You can enter a directory file extention if you want all file types just enter a a minimum file size and a modified before date The spreadsheet will perform a search of the directory and all subdirectories and return the files matching the criteria you specified The information is returned sorted by directory but you can then sort by size date or whatever This should help you make a quick pass through your files on the O drive to determine some of the olderbigger ones you can clean up I would encourage you not to just enter O in the directory because the program will take forever and you will run out of rows in excel to store the data Since it is in Excel it will take just a while if you run it on a directory with a lot of files so be a little patient I dont want to spend a lot of time supporting this thing so if you distribute further just dont tell them where you got it from unless you want to designate a given person on your desk to perform the work Let me know if you have questions or problems Greg
DPR ProcessPST When Friday January AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ECS

RE CARTVery interesting Id saw where it was settled but only a small statement If you think that is interesting then check this one out rpmcarthtml Original Message From Giron Darron C Sent Tuesday October PM To Couch Greg Subject CART rpmcarthtml

RE CARTIt is unbelievable how the management both past and present think they can run a business with no regard for the customer They have to be one of the worst marketing organizations in the world They have a great product but dont have a clue on how to promote it Another big news item PPI used to be the headline sponser They left a few years ago and FedEx came on board Rumors are rampant that FedEx will be leaving soon You have to wonder what it takes to make the light go on for some people It is extremely frustrating to try and continue to be a fan Original Message From Giron Darron C Sent Wednesday October AM To Couch Greg Subject RE CART Maybe you should stump for president of the series Actually that would be a great job You couldnt do much worse it seems DG Original Message From Couch Greg Sent Wednesday October AM To Giron Darron C Subject RE CART Ive been warning them for years the BOZO management to get their act together But who am I Im just a stupid lowly fan who knows nothing in their eyes Original Message From Giron Darron C Sent Wednesday October AM To Couch Greg Subject RE CART That sounds very bad Did I read that correctly It basically says that the series is on the brink of collapse DG Original Message From Couch Greg Sent Tuesday October PM To Giron Darron C Subject RE CART Very interesting Id saw where it was settled but only a small statement If you think that is interesting then check this one out rpmcarthtml Original Message From Giron Darron C Sent Tuesday October PM To Couch Greg Subject CART rpmcarthtml

RE CARTIve been warning them for years the BOZO management to get their act together But who am I Im just a stupid lowly fan who knows nothing in their eyes Original Message From Giron Darron C Sent Wednesday October AM To Couch Greg Subject RE CART That sounds very bad Did I read that correctly It basically says that the series is on the brink of collapse DG Original Message From Couch Greg Sent Tuesday October PM To Giron Darron C Subject RE CART Very interesting Id saw where it was settled but only a small statement If you think that is interesting then check this one out rpmcarthtml Original Message From Giron Darron C Sent Tuesday October PM To Couch Greg Subject CART rpmcarthtml

This is hillariousDont know if youve seen it or not but read all the way to the end I dont know who Dave is Original Message From Bruce A Bernard mailto Sent Wednesday October AM To David Ruzicka Couch Greg Subject FW THis is GREAT Ya knowsome people look for things like thisand it amazes me At first I rolled my eyesthen I read Daves response and I couldnt have said it better if I had all day to do it original letter The date of the attack September th is the th day of the year After September th there are days left to the end of the year is the area code to IraqIran Twin Towers standing side by side looks like the number The first plane to hit the towers was Flight I Have More State of New York The th State added to the Union New York City Letters Afghanistan Letters The Pentagon Letters Ramzi Yousef Letters convictedorchestrating the attack on the WTC in Flight on board Flight on board Daves response Oh my God How worried should I be There are letters in the name David Pawson Im going into hiding NOW See you in a few weeks Wait a sec just realized YOU CANT HIDE also has letters What am I gonna do Help me The terrorists are after me ME I cant believe it Oh crap there must be someplace on the planet Earth I could hide But no PLANET EARTH has letters too Maybe Nostradamus can help me But dare I trust him There are letters in NOSTRADAMUS I know the Red Cross can help No they cant letters in THE RED CROSS cant trust them I would rely on self defense but SELF DEFENSE has letters in it too Can someone help Anyone If so send me email No dont SEND ME EMAIL has letters Will this never end Im going insane GOING INSANE Eleven letters Nooooooooooo I guess Ill die alone even though ILL DIE ALONE has letters Oh my God I just realized that America is doomed Our Independence Day is July th Dave PS ITS BULLSHIT has letters also Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp

Todays Excel class canceledMy apologies for canceling todays class I am at home sick Todays class was only to last mintues or so and provide a brief introduction If you dont already have your book please get it today from the box on the floor by my desk Read chapter one and do the exercises for Wednesday The first part of the book is fairly slow reading but lays some important groundwork Also my recommendation is that for the first couple of chapters you do both the Excel and Word examples The extra practice with Word will help you discover more about VBA that will be useful to you in future Excel work After the first couple chapters the author shifts largely towards Excel If you set aside a dedicated time to work on the class material it shouldnt take you that long to complete Also my suggestion for you to get the most out of the class is to do your homework BEFORE the morning of the class This gives you time to think about the concepts and go back and review if necessary Also I would encourage you to try and do each of the exercises at the end of the chapters Let me know if you have questions Sorry again for missing the class This wont be a common practice I promise

The next Excel class Cc You have been slated for the next Excelmacro class Attendees will most likely be Derek Bailey Darron Giron Brad Jones Kam Keiser Errol McLaughlin Scott Palmer I anticipate starting the class the first week of October This is a little late in the year with the holidays to finish by the year end so we may need January to finish up The meeting times will most likely be Mondays and Wednesdays from am to pm The focus of the class will be learning basic programmingalgorithm techniques using Excel and VBA as a platform with enough real world experiences and examples to keep your interest I would encourage you to talk with Phillip Love and Anne Bike to get their feedback on the progress of the class so far they are about weeks into the class although the first or sessions are pretty dry and the time requirements There are biweekly reading assignments and exercises to complete In addition I will assign a few projects along the way The time required should be very manageable unless something out of the ordinary comes up Consider your availability We are all busy but I believe if you invest the time in the class it will be beneficial to you Let me know if something in your schedule will prevent you from devoting the required time so that I can find a replacement for your slot I havent decided whether to purchase your textbooks myself or make everyone responsible for obtaining their own Ill let you know when October is getting closer Let me know if you have questions I look forward to going through the class material with you Greg

Resend of excel spreadsheetis the spreadsheet we discussed in todays meeting It should be pretty straightforward If you have any questions please ask Ill be happy to help you out I will look at a way to tiein Winzip with this spreadsheet I dont know if it is possible but if I can accomplish it Ill let you know Greg Forwarded by Greg CouchHOUECT on AM Greg Couch PM To Steve CT William CT Jeffrey C CT Kam CT Dutch CT cc Subject Excel file to help you out Here is a spreadsheet I worked up to help you determine what files need to be cleaned up It is pretty simple and straightforward You can enter a directory file extention if you want all file types just enter a a minimum file size and a modified before date The spreadsheet will perform a search of the directory and all subdirectories and return the files matching the criteria you specified The information is returned sorted by directory but you can then sort by size date or whatever This should help you make a quick pass through your files on the O drive to determine some of the olderbigger ones you can clean up I would encourage you not to just enter O in the directory because the program will take forever and you will run out of rows in excel to store the data Since it is in Excel it will take just a while if you run it on a directory with a lot of files so be a little patient I dont want to spend a lot of time supporting this thing so if you distribute further just dont tell them where you got it from unless you want to designate a given person on your desk to perform the work Let me know if you have questions or problems Greg

FW Life as a GuyOriginal Message From Bailey Derek Sent Friday June AM To Couch Greg Subject FW Life as a Guy Original Message From Anderson Diane Sent Friday June AM To Bailey Derek Subject FW Life as a Guy Original Message From Matulewich Jennifer ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESMatulewichCJenniferCjmatulewlehmanEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday June AM To Christine Hanley Anderson Diane Tina Conte joanne Subject FW Life as a Guy Hehefunny but totally not true Original Message From Pearson Kimberly Sent Wednesday June AM To Danielle Drohan Sharyn Esposito Janet Matulewich Jennifer Waschek Pati Colgan Carol Kerry Subject FW Life as a Guy This is great Lamour really funny animationasf This message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the designated recipients named above If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited This communication is for information purposes only and should not be regarded as an offer to sell or as a solicitation of an offer to buy any financial product an official confirmation of any transaction or as an official statement of Lehman Brothers Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree Therefore we do not represent that this information is complete or accurate and it should not be relied upon as such All information is subject to change without notice Lamour really funny animationasf

Excel class Cc I know that each of you are interested in an Excel class along with a lot of the floor As you know I have started a class with a couple of participants as a test If the class goes well I plan to start another class in months I anticipate each class will last approximately months If you are still interested whenif I begin another class you will have first shot at enrollment Right now I am thinking a class would be participants All of this of course depends on whether my two current students feel the class is worthwhile I believe it will be I will keep you up to date I feel I have some specific knowledge that if I do a good job of relaying to you will provide a boost to your effectiveness as you move up and through the organization That is certainly my goal for you Please feel free to ask questions on the status of the class I certainly hope this works out because teaching is one of the things I really enjoy I apologize to you again for not opening up the initial class to more participants the first time around Thanks for your interest Greg
benefitsSPDhtm

FW PROJECT Here is a test of several items you have learned in the Excel class so far I have set up a basic program structure for you that opens a file and reads the file line by line into the variable sBuf You should write functions that tally the results asked for on Sheet number of lines in the file number of characters etc A user should be able to enter a search source string Given the string you should also search for how many times it occurs in the file under different conditions casesensitive caseinsensitive and as a word separated by blanks You should have all the basic concepts down to complete the program fairly easily Work on this project and we will discuss it on the Monday following Thanksgiving I will be out tomorrow and next week Have fun Original Message From Love Phillip M Sent Thursday November AM To Couch Greg Subject PROJECT HERE IT IS PL

FW Bush and ClintonOriginal Message From Clark Mike mailto RCAGCOM Sent Monday November AM To Greg CouchEnron Email Subject FW Bush and Clinton Original Message From May Dallas Sent Monday November AM To Clark Mike Kirksey Andy Wayne M Terri HM rcamp Marlena Hardin Peggy Hardin Mark Dawn Subject FW Bush and Clinton Original Message From Bill Wallace mailto Sent Thursday November AM To Brian Crawford Email Dallas May Email Dewayne Walker Email Donny Easom Email George Cudworth Email Jay Yeaman Email Tom Opie Email Subject FW Bush and Clinton George W Bush and Bill Clinton somehow ended up at the same barbershop As they sat there each being worked on by a different barber not a word was spoken The barbers were both afraid to start a conversation for fear it would turn to politics As the barbers finished their shaves the one who had Clinton in his chair reached for the aftershave Clinton was quick to stop him saying No thanks my wife Hillary will smell that and think Ive been in a whorehouse The second barber turned to Bush and said How about you Bush replied Go ahead My wife Laura doesnt know what the inside of a whorehouse smells like

Your fileJohn I tried to call you at work a little while ago but they said you were gone for the day My cable modem has been out all day long and just came up minutes ago Sorry for not getting you a solution before you left I will look at the file I see it in my inbox and if I can tell you how to apply the fix Ill send you a note Greg

Small logic errorPST John I found the error It was a small logic error You can easily fix the problem if you go into the visual basic editor for the blotter file In the editor you will see several modules listed on the left of the screen under the file You will need to edit the MainQuery module Once in the MainQuery module you will need to search for the routine named VerifyManualInputs The actual start of the routine looks like this Function VerifyManualInputsFromDate As String ToDate As String PutCall As String Lots As String Strike As String Price As String CParty As String sType As String As Boolean Within this routine about lines down you should see the following two lines If isdateFromDate And isdateToDate Then If ToDate FromDate Then You need to change the second line to If CDateToDate CDateFromDate Then This should fix the problem The intent of the line is to prevent the To Date of a deal from being earlier than the From Date In the original line of code it does a TEXT based compare like comparing is ABC DEF instead of comparing the two values as DATES The modification Ive laid out converts the from and to dates to date values before comparing I have tested the fix here and it should work fine I hope everything runs smooth for you next week Have a good Thanksgiving Greg

Status of fileJohn We havent had the chance to talk the last days only briefly today so I just wanted you to know I havent forgotten about you and I am doing what I can to get your stuff finished alongside my other todo items As we discussed this evening I know I still owe you your desired modifications to the input screens I believe we are functionally there you just want some look and feel modifications Let me know if this you think of something different Also if you begin using the valuation model again tomorrow morning let me know how it goes accuracy morning macro etc I really want this in production and I want it to be successful for you Hopefully things go well with the mods Ive done to the valuation stuff Greg
New fileJohn Its in my dropbox and is named JG Let me know if you have questionsproblems Greg

Recap of points we are to addressPST Please review this list and our proposed solutions I would like for us to provide the consolidated list to Jeff on Monday since we have no staff meeting next week Let me know if you see any omissions Management skills Enable employees to provide anonymous feedback to other desk controllers Management class MentalityDedication of employees Spread projects around within desk Know what your employees goals are and try to assist them in achieving those goals Amex gift cards from both Risk and Trading Spend weeks with new employees investing our time in them to help them learn Have more group outings Manual processes Attend IT meetings Greg employee for Greg Development of analytical skills Use quizzes as a tool to identify areas where employees are deficient Let group members teach each other I dont remember exactly what this point washelp me reword it

Heres the email addressPST Heres the email address for the person interested in buying the balls Again Im not sure what she is willing to pay but she seemed eager to buy ENE stuff I should charge you a listing fee mailto Greg

RE Recap of points we are to addressPST I have received feedback from a couple of you If the rest of you have anything to offer please do so Otherwise we will proceed with the list below in addition to the feedback that I have received Original Message From Couch Greg Sent Thursday July PM To Keiser Kam McLaughlin Jr Errol Love Phillip M Bike Anne Valdes John Severson Russ Winfree ONeal D Baumbach David Subject Recap of points we are to address Please review this list and our proposed solutions I would like for us to provide the consolidated list to Jeff on Monday since we have no staff meeting next week Let me know if you see any omissions Management skills Enable employees to provide anonymous feedback to other desk controllers Management class MentalityDedication of employees Spread projects around within desk Know what your employees goals are and try to assist them in achieving those goals Amex gift cards from both Risk and Trading Spend weeks with new employees investing our time in them to help them learn Have more group outings Manual processes Attend IT meetings Greg employee for Greg Development of analytical skills Use quizzes as a tool to identify areas where employees are deficient Let group members teach each other I dont remember exactly what this point washelp me reword it

FW Follow Up Meetings from OffsitePST The agenda for the meetings is to discuss ways to address the four highest priority items raised in the offsite Jeff as you recall has asked us for our proposed solutions at the staff meeting in two weeks As a reminder here are the four Management skills MetalityDedication of employees Manual processes Development of analytical skills Let me know if you have questions Greg Original Message From Hogan Irena D Sent Monday July PM To McLaughlin Jr Errol Keiser Kam Love Phillip M Bike Anne Valdes John Severson Russ Winfree ONeal D Baumbach David Couch Greg Gillis Brian Cc Soto Elizabeth Subject Follow Up Meetings from Offsite I have scheduled two lunch meetings per Greg Couch to serve as follow up meetings from this weekends offsite These meetings will take place this Wednesday and next Wednesday July and both in EB from AM PM Houston time Brian please reply to me with a number for us to reach you via telephone conference for these meetings Thank you Irena

RE Revival of the Risk brown bag sessionsPST Just a reminder to each of you that I requested this info by tomorrow Ive received only one response so far Let me know if you have questions Greg Forwarded by Greg CouchHOUECT on PM Greg Couch PM To Kam CT Phillip M CT Darron C CT Errol NRON David CT John CT Martha CT Russ CT cc Irena D CT Jeffrey C CT Subject Revival of the Risk brown bag sessions I have decided to revive the risk brown bag training sessions I need from each of you a list of the topics you would like to see covered I would like to see topics ranging from the most basic up whatever you feel is necessary for your group Please provide these to me no later than Feel free to offer anything Think about the concepts in the training modules while you are compiling your lists Once I have the topics I will work with you to arrange a logical order to cover them in After that Irena and I will set up a calendar with approximately one session per month I am targeting midMay for the first session The format of each session is up to the presenter but a couple of suggestions are a short presentation followed by QA or an open forum Each session will be led by one of you a suitable substitute Jeff or I depending on the topic I will schedule with your input and cooperation who will present each topic I am also sending this note to John and Russ John I ask that you think about OA concepts that you feel will benefit the risk group help our personnel work better with your group and help us understand your duties better I would like for you to present at least a couple of topics to us Russ if you think there are Sitara issues that would benefit the group please let me know I am open to whether these sessions are mandatory or not My feeling is that some should be and others the ones of a more basic nature should only be mandatory for those people you feel need that months subject matter Let me know your opinion on this With a small investment of your time I believe this will be an excellent vehicle to get and keep topics of interest and training in front of your people I look forward to receiving your lists Let me know if you have any questions Greg

Revival of the Risk brown bag sessions Cc I have decided to revive the risk brown bag training sessions I need from each of you a list of the topics you would like to see covered I would like to see topics ranging from the most basic up whatever you feel is necessary for your group Please provide these to me no later than Feel free to offer anything Think about the concepts in the training modules while you are compiling your lists Once I have the topics I will work with you to arrange a logical order to cover them in After that Irena and I will set up a calendar with approximately one session per month I am targeting midMay for the first session The format of each session is up to the presenter but a couple of suggestions are a short presentation followed by QA or an open forum Each session will be led by one of you a suitable substitute Jeff or I depending on the topic I will schedule with your input and cooperation who will present each topic I am also sending this note to John and Russ John I ask that you think about OA concepts that you feel will benefit the risk group help our personnel work better with your group and help us understand your duties better I would like for you to present at least a couple of topics to us Russ if you think there are Sitara issues that would benefit the group please let me know I am open to whether these sessions are mandatory or not My feeling is that some should be and others the ones of a more basic nature should only be mandatory for those people you feel need that months subject matter Let me know your opinion on this With a small investment of your time I believe this will be an excellent vehicle to get and keep topics of interest and training in front of your people I look forward to receiving your lists Let me know if you have any questions Greg
